s: Drawing from various progressive rock predecessors, this CD proves that there is a vibrant group of new young bands carrying the prog torch. You can hear many influences in the music: Yes, mid-period Rush, Gentle Giant...but what this reminds me most of is Leftoverture era Kansas. The performances are great.
